Title: rdrx
Description: A Google Reader style rss feed reader that can be deployed to Microsoft Azure.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Google Reader style rss feed reader that can be deployed to Microsoft Azure.

A long time ago in galaxy far away ...

Google use to have a pretty awesome feed reader called Google Reader https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_Reader. It was closed by Google in 2013, and while many have tried to replace it, nobody has come quite close.

This project is me trying to do this ... maybe not recreate exactly ... but to create something like it.
